nodes.text: Jiaozi was a city situated on Felucia. It was home to the many water stations that a toxin was spreading to. Aayla Secura, Barriss Offee, and their Padawans attempted to stop the poison from spreading there. After the deaths of the Jedi, the newly formed Galactic Empire finished the job of stopping the spread.

In Star Wars: Empire at War: Forces of Corruption, if the player plays as the Zann Consortium and reviews the racketeering option for Felucia, it says: "Only a successful infiltration of the Jiaozi facility will adequately allow the Consortium to set up the type of Racketeering organization Felucia needs."
